channel.title: Providing data across various issue domains of Global Governance on Geneva Global Governance Observatory
channel.description: Recent content in Providing data across various issue domains of Global Governance on Geneva Global Governance Observatory

item.title: An overview of the GGO data
item.description: We have collected lots of data on about Global Governance from multiple sources! All of the data is publicly available in the form of R packages for various issue-domains of global Governance.
